titlePart.text: PHYSICAL OR CHEMICAL PROCESSES OR APPARATUS IN GENERAL
titlePart.entryReference: furnaces, kilns, ovens, retorts, in general
separating solids from solids by wet methods ,

noteParagraph.text: The processes covered by this sub-class include evaporation, distillation, crystallisation, filtration, dust precipitation, gas cleaning, absorption, adsorption.
This sub-class also includes similar processes which are not concerned with, or limited to, separation (except in the case of absorption or adsorption).
The word "filtration" and related words should be interpreted as embracing straining liquids from solids.
For apparatus used in drying or evaporation, takes precedence over .
When considering the sub-divisions of this sub-class, it should be borne in mind that group takes precedence over the other groups of this sub-class and over other sub-classes.
